title: GitHub Fly Deployment Configuration.
description: Configuration for deploying Nx projects to Fly.io.

flyPostgresPreview.description: The name of the Fly Postgres cluster to attach when deploying to preview.

flyPostgresProduction.description: The name of the Fly Postgres cluster to attach when deploying to production.

flyPostgresDatabaseName.description: The database name to use when attaching to Postgres. Use this to ensure multiple apps share the same database instead of creating separate databases.
